name: Apa³
description:
Watch this space! I'll upload the builds again once they've been fixed...

A fairly self-indulgent game exploring different art styles and my personal journey with self-confidence as a half English and half Malay person, as well as my journey into languages and learning to accept myself. 

I hope you enjoy my first game, and check back at a later point in the future for more, thank you. 

[Started: ~Feb 2021     Finished: 14/04/2021]

@Jess.tification

Audio has been made by Simon Lambros & used with permission. You can find more of his work at: Hellfiremusic.co.uk .
